amendment.description: To impose a temporary windfall profits tax on crude oil and to use the proceeds of the tax collected to fund programs under the Low-Income Energy Assistance Act of 1981 through a trust fund.

action.text: Amendment SA 2626 proposed by Senator Reed.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2626.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2626 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 339.
Amendment SA 2626 ruled out of order by the chair.
